title: Used
description: New Adult Biker RomanceBoI did six years in prison to protect the Grove Motorcycle Club. Now free, I remain trapped in their lies. The only freedom I find is in the bed of a girl who's no one's favorite.SydneyThe club owns me and I see no escape until Bo. With his rough manner, I should protect my heart. If only it were so easy.Used is a standalone novella with sexual and violent themes.Cover art by Miranda Koryluk.
author: Bijou Hunter
